! Pedestal for Books: Solin has promised to dedicate his life Einhasad to humble service of her forgiveness of her sins, the sins of her father and the entire imperial house. But sincere prayer young Solina not soften the heart of the angry goddess. For the great sins of the father Solina Baium goddess took away her sight and only humbled his anger. Solina meekly accepted the punishment and continued to serve the goddess, carrying the burden of the sins of the imperial family. Solin led a modest life recluse, bravely enduring all the hardships. Her kindness and compassion throughout her glorified Elmoredenu whose inhabitants worshiped as a saint Solin.
